comment_output_directory: Optional: Global output directory for all generated images. Can be overridden per task. Default is current directory.

schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

tasks.img_prompt: Transform the subject from the uploaded image into a character in the style of Charlie and Lola (children’s cartoon). Use thin, sketchy outlines, flat bold colors, childlike proportions, playful hand-drawn charm, and simple paper-cut textures. Retain the subject’s original clothing, hairstyle, facial features, accessories, skin tone, pose, and expression, but reinterpret them to match the Charlie and Lola world. Simplify clothing into flat, colorful shapes while keeping the outfit recognizable. For the background, adapt the original scene into the Charlie and Lola style, with the same whimsical flatness and hand-drawn charm. Negative Prompt: No realistic shading, no detailed rendering, no anime or manga style, no 3D modeling, no photographic textures, no realism.
